Detailed Description

A backpropagation connector.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationConnector.BackpropagationConnector ( IConnector  connector,
INetwork  parentNetwork 
)

Creates a new backpropagation connector by decorating a connector.

Parameters:
connector The connector to be decorated as backpropagation connector.
parentNetwork The parent network.

Member Function Documentation

void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationConnector.CalculateSynapseGradients (  ) 

Calculates the gradient of all synapses in the connector using the backpropagation algorithm.

override void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationConnector.Connect (  ) 

Connects the (backpropagation) connector.

A connector is said to be connected if: 1. it is aware of its source layer (and vice versa), 2. it is aware of its target layer (and vice versa), and 3. its synapses are connected.

override void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationConnector.Disconnect (  ) 

Disconnects the (backpropagation) connector.

A connector is said to be disconnected if: 1. its source layer is not aware of it (and vice versa), 2. its target layer is not aware of it (and vice versa), and 3. its synapses are disconnected.

void NeuralNetwork.Teachers.BackpropagationTeacher.BackpropagationConnector.ResetSynapseErrors (  ) 

Resets the error of all synapses in the connector.

Returns a string representation of the backpropagation connector.

A string representation of the backpropagation connector.

Updates the error of all synapses in the connector.

Updates the weights of all synapses in the connector.
